title: Polish Humanist Sans Serif
content:
Would really appreciate any thoughts on what the typeface on this poster is:

[http://www.page-online.de//media/galerien/Galerie\_zum\_Artikel/00\_2013/07...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829152255/http:/www.page-online.de/media/galerien/Galerie_zum_Artikel/00_2013/07_2013/KR_130702_Homework/KR_130702_Homework_PolskiTheatreBydogoszcz_babel-2010.jpg "http://www.page-online.de//media/galerien/Galerie\_zum\_Artikel/00\_2013/07\_2013/KR\_130702\_Homework/KR\_130702\_Homework\_PolskiTheatreBydogoszcz\_babel-2010.jpg")
author: andychen

comments.content: Various weights of [Teuton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829152255/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/teuton) by František Štorm.
